Class KOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • KOps

  • public final class KOps
extends java.lang.Object
    KOps provides primitive image kernel operations. This is a pseudo-static class (should not be instantiated).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Pixel convolve3D(java.util.ArrayList<BadRaster> rasters, int x, int y, int z, Kernel kernel)
      Convolves a given pixel with a kernel.

      Load a kernel from JSON.
      static boolean[] sideCheck(float[][][] kernel, float threshold)
      Returns a six-element boolean array indicate which side of the passed array are all less (absolute value) than a threshold.
      static float sum(float[][] kernel)
      Returns the sum of a 2D kernel.

      Returns the sum of a 3D kernel.

    • Method Detail

      • convolve3D

        public static Pixel convolve3D(java.util.ArrayList<BadRaster> rasters,
                               int x,
                               int y,
                               int z,
                               Kernel kernel)
        Convolves a given pixel with a kernel.
        Parameters:
        rasters - A raster array.
        x - The X coordinate to center around.
        y - The Y coordinate to center around.
        z - The Z coordinate to center around.
        kernel - The kernel to convolve the source raster with.
        Returns:
        A n-band float vector representing a pixel, where n is the number of bands.

      • sideCheck

        public static boolean[] sideCheck(float[][][] kernel,
                                  float threshold)
        Returns a six-element boolean array indicate which side of the passed array are all less (absolute value) than a threshold. Ordered [top,right,bottom,left,front,back].
        Parameters:
        kernel - A kernel in raw floating point format
        threshold - The threshold to compare against.
        Returns:
        A boolean array indicate which sides are all below the threshold.

      • sum

        public static float sum(float[][] kernel)
        Returns the sum of a 2D kernel. Utility method.
        Parameters:
        kernel - A two-dimensional array to be summed
        Returns:
        The sum of the array

      • sum

        public static double sum(float[][][] kernel)
        Returns the sum of a 3D kernel. Utility method.
        Parameters:
        kernel - A three-dimensional array to be summed
        Returns:
        The sum of the array

      • kernelFromJSONPath

        public static JSONKernel kernelFromJSONPath(java.lang.String path)
        Load a kernel from JSON. GSON parses the JSON file into a JSONKernel object, which is then converted to a regular Kernel
        Parameters:
        path - The JSON kernel path
        Returns:
        A JSONKernel derived from the JSON kernel
